category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 1 (Purpose and grounds for holding)
contents: Article 1 (Purpose and grounds for holding) ① The Korean Sports Council holds a comprehensive sports competition in Korea every year in accordance with Article 5, Paragraph 1, Item 2 of the Articles of Incorporation. ② The purpose of the comprehensive sports competition is to spread sports to all citizens, promote the sports spirit, improve the stature of the people, expand the base of local sports, and create a cheerful and orderly social atmosphere to contribute to the development of national culture. Do this.
